definition.content: period of time long enough for there to be concern about the impacts of changing technologies, including support for new media and data formats, and of a changing designated community, on the information being held in an OAIS

notes.content: This period extends into the indefinite future.

origin.clause: 1.7.2, modified — Supporting content has been relocated to Note 1 to entry.

definition.content: periodo de tiempo suficientemente largo para que la información que contiene un OAIS se vea afectada por los impactos de los cambios tecnológicos, incluidos el mantenimiento para nuevos formatos de datos y soportes, y los cambios en una comunidad especifica.

notes.content: NOTA: Este periodo se extiende hacia un futuro indefinido.

origin.clause: 1.7.2, modified — Supporting content has been relocated to Note 1 to entry.
